mainText:
I was introduced to my first computer, and apple II when i was 12 years 
old at my uncles house and have been a computer geek and mac lover ever 
since.  I may not always agree with a policy or a plan but i cannot 
dismiss how much change has transpired because of Steve's vision and 
leadership.  He was an amazing man that is in short supply in this world 
and his impact will be felt for generations to come.  I am truly sorry 
for his families loss and for apple's loss.
author: Nick
